section.title: Statistical Measures of Software Quality
section.simpara: Two primary metrics will be used to certify software quality, the Mean Time To Failure and Reliability. The MTTF and Reliability will be calculated per increment on the basis of whole system sampling using the sampling model for statistical benchmarks. Both will be expressed in terms of individual test case executions, as opposed to some metric of time.

This means that an increment will be certified only after it has been shown to have zero failures in a statistically representative testing session.
